name: Backyard Brawl (itch)
description:
Your next door neighbour has borrowed your lawnmower and wont give it back!

The only way to resolve this is semi-violent backyard combat using common garden items as projectiles. Throw them over the fence at your neighbour to teach him a lesson! Make sure you jump out the way of incoming buckets, garden gnomes, potted plants and the like.

Backyard Brawl is best played with a friend sharing the same keyboard.

Got no friends? No problem! Try your skill against a computer-controlled player instead.

Made in 2 days for 8 Bits to Inifinity ~ Two Button Jam 2019.

Controls

Player 1   Player 2S - JUMP
C - THROW▲ - JUMP
◄ - THROW
